summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 41W, page 112 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 5, Squire Park Addition from RM 800 to CG, adopting certain findings and conclusions of the Council regarding such rezoning and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Providence Medical Center, C.F. 282714, Hearing Examiner No. X-75-238).
